nodes.text: Meryx was a rare gemstone formed from the fossilized wroshyr trees of Kashyyyk. It appeared white and clouded, but shone gold when hit by light at a certain angle. During the High Republic Era, Wookiee Jedi Padawan Burryaga Agaburry's lightsaber hilt was made from the substance. The jewel thieves Pax Maripher and Rahara Wick named their freighter the Meryx after the gemstone.
